description.p: Strike: Action; Make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)
Shoot: Action; Make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your main hand. (Damage: weapon damage and add modifier)

Hilt Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a single-bladed weapon in your main or off-hand, make a melee attack with the hilt of that weapon, possibly dazing them. The target must make a Constitution saving throw: DC:8 + proficiency bonus + Strength or Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target becomes dazed (dazed: has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws, can't take Reactions and loses the Dexterity bonus to their AC). On a successful save, the target doesn't get dazed. (Damage: 1d4 kinetic)
Slash: Action; When wielding double bladed weapon, make a melee attack that hits in a 15 feet horizontal line in front of you. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)

Blast: Action; Blast multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)

Flame: Action; Flame multiple targets in a cone in front of you. Each target makes a Dexterity saving throw, DC 8 + proficiency bonus (if applicable) + Dexterity modifier. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 2 turns. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. (Damage: Weapon Damage and add modifier)
Off-Hand Strike: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a melee attack with the melee weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Quick Shot: Bonus Action; When dual-wielding, make a ranged attack with the ranged weapon in your off-hand. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Back Strike: Bonus Action; When wielding a double bladed weapon, make a melee attack with the other side of your weapon. (Damage: weapon damage without adding modifiers)
Reload: Action; After x amount of shots your weapon needs a reload, take a full Action to fully reload your weapon.
1d6 energy, power cell, range 50/200, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot
1d6 energy, power cell, range 80/320, Reload 4, two-handed, choose Strength or Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick shot | Properties: two-handed | Actions: Shoot, Quick shot
1d4 ion, power cell, range 40/160, Reload 16, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot

1d4 cold, power cell, range 30/120, Reload 8, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot
1d6 kinetic, slug cartridge, range 40/160, Reload 16, requires Strength 11 to use, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot
1d6 acid, power cell, range 45/180, Reload 12, requires Strength 11 to use, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot
1d6 energy, power cell, silent, two-handed, Reload 6, Dexterity modifier), Shoot | Properties: two-handed | Actions: Shoot

1d6 energy, disguised, can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon, power cell, range 30/120, Reload 8, Dexterity modifier), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot
can't be disarmed, can still use hand but when holding something can't use weapon), Shoot, Quick Shot | Actions: Shoot, Quick Shot

AC: 11 + Dexterity modifier
AC: 12 + Dexterity modifier
AC: 13 + Dexterity modifier, disadvantage on stealth
AC: 13 + Dexterity modifier (max +2)
AC: 14 + Dexterity modifier (max +2)
AC: 14 + Dexterity modifier (max +2). Special: If an enemy rolls max damage on the dice, they have to reroll and use that reroll.
AC: 15 + Dexterity modifier (max +2), disadvantage on stealth
AC: 16, disadvantage on stealth, resistant to kinetic damage
AC: 17, disadvantage on stealth, resistant to kinetic damage
AC: 18, disadvantage on stealth, resistant to kinetic damage
A physical shield that provides +2 AC when wielded. Must be proficient with shields.
A small personal shield generator that provides +10 temporary hit points once per long rest.
A medium personal shield generator that provides +20 temporary hit points once per long rest.
A large personal shield generator that provides +40 temporary hit points once per long rest.
An energy shield that provides +3 AC and halves damage from lightning sources. Must be held in off-hand.
A kit containing tools and parts for repairing weapons, armor, and technology. Requires repair kit proficiency to use.
A kit containing materials for forging documents and making counterfeit credits. Requires forgery kit proficiency to use.
A kit containing specialized equipment for slicing terminals to open locks or disarm traps. Requires slicing kit proficiency to use.
A kit containing tools for hacking droids or security systems. Requires hacking kit proficiency to use.
A kit containing cosmetics and prosthetics for completely changing your look. Requires disguise kit proficiency to use.
A kit containing poisons and applicators for coating weapons. Requires poisoning kit proficiency to use.
A jumppack and jump boots that allow you to jump up to 25 feet vertically or horizontally as a bonus action. Requires jumppack proficiency.
A hoverpack and hover boots that allow you to hover up to 15 feet in the air for 2 turns as a bonus action. Requires hoverpack proficiency.
An advanced jetpack and jet boots that combine jump and hover capabilities. Allows jumping up to 30 feet or hovering with movement. Requires jumppack, hoverpack, and jetpack proficiency.
10d8 + 20 energy, 35 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
15 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is blinded for 1 round. On a successful save, the target isn't blinded

1d8 cold, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. The explosion creates an icy surface of 10 feet that counts as difficult terrain. Each creature walking over it must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature falls prone. On a successful save, the creature doesn't fall

1d8 ion, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage, On a successful save, the target takes half damage. Each droid must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the droid is stunned for 1 round. On a successful save, the droid isn't stunned

1d6 fire, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and is inflicted burning for 1 turn. On a successful save, the target takes half damage. Sets ground on fire in a 10 feet radius for 3 turns. Each target standing or walking in this will be inflicted burning for 1 turn

2d6 acid, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes no damage. The explosion creates an acid surface of 10 feet that reduces AC by 2
creates gas cloud, 10 feet radius. Each creature in the gas must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes poisoned
2d8 kinetic, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
2d8 energy, 10 feet radius. Each target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage. On a successful save, the target takes half damage
1d6 lightning but cannot reduce a creature's health to 0. 10 feet radius. The explosion creates an electrifying field that counts as difficult terrain for 3 turns in a 10 feet radius

15 feet line, The target must make a DC 8 + proficiency + Dexterity modifier, Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is restrained. On a successful save, the target isn't restrained. If the target is restrained he target can on their turn use an Action to do a Strength saving throw against 8 + proficiency + Strength modifier of the restrainer. On a failed save, the targets stays restrained. On a successful save, the target is freed. The Restrainer can't use Bonus Actions or hold something in that hand when restraining someone, Dexterity modifier
1d10 fire, Reload 2, canister, 15 feet line, Dexterity modifier), Flame | Actions: Flame

The target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes full damage and becomes poisoned. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and doesn't become poisoned
The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls asleep. On a successful save, the target doesn't fall asleep
The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes paralysed for 1 round
The target must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes frightened for 1 round. On a successful save, the target doesn't become frightened
2d4 + 2 healing
4d4 + 4 healing
8d4 + 8 healing
10d4 + 20 healing
The bandfill is a musical instrument, commonly used in jizz, that featured a number of mounted horn bells called reciprocator horns and a ploong sounder
The Chidinkalu horn is a musical instrument made by the Kitonaks from the hollowed-out reeds of a chidinka. It produced low tones and is used in the rhythm section
Drums are a type of percussive musical instrument
The fanfar is a musical instrument commonly used in jizz. Fanfars appeared to be reedy instruments with a mouthpiece, and the slots along the fanfar are known as farra slots
The Dorenian Beshniquel, also known as the Fizzz, is a short, single-reed wind instrument, which is adjusted via peel rod
Flutes are a type of woodwind instrument. One type of flute is the reed flute

The kloo horn is a double-reeded wind instrument, larger than a Slitherhorn and a Fizzz[1] (roughly 1.5 meters tall), and one of the most commonly used instruments in the galaxy | Actions: and one of the most commonly used instruments in the galaxy)
The lute-pipe is a musical instrument that is played by plucking and blowing into it
The mandoviol is a stringed musical instrument, it is a difficult instrument to master, but could be used to play ballads as well as energetic jizz tunes with equal aplomb
The ommni box is a notoriously hard-to-play instrument which enhanced music, and is commonly used in jizz. It is usually used as an amplifier to attenuate and alter the bass aspects of the music
The slitherhorn is a musical instrument common among jizz bands. It is similar in appearance to the kloo horn, though smaller in size
The traz is a musical instrument similar in appearance and sound to the slitherhorn
The valahorn is a type of musical instrument that is similar in appearance and sound to a Kloo horn
The Xantha is a difficult musical instrument that involved plucking strings and covering holes with one's fingers

An attachment for jump/hover/jetpacks that allows shooting rockets. Action: reload rocketpack. Bonus action: shoot rocket. Can use: plasma rocket, cryo rocket, ion rocket, incendiary rocket, corrosive rocket, fragmentation rocket.
